Text: i have sent my ad2600 back to apex because it wo n't play certain disney and other dvd movies ( no disc message ) .  they sent me a new ad2600 with the same problem .  i call apex customer service and they told me that there is a known problem with the model playing disney and other movies and that it is not there problem so i 'm stuck with a new dvd player that wo n't play my kids disney movies .
